mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER( USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NM, USER_EMAIL, USER_RGD ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{userNm}, #{userEmail}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID , USER_NM , USER_EMAIL , USER_ROLE FROM USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND USER_PWD = #{userPwd}

SELECT * FROM USER ORDER BY USER_ROLE
WHERE 1 = 0 OR USER_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userSearch.searchKeyword}, '%') OR USER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userSearch.searchKeyword}, '%')
WHERE 1 = 1
AND USER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{boardSearch.searchKeyword}, '%')
AND USER_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{boardSearch.searchKeyword}, '%')

SELECT USER_ID, USER_NM, USER_EMAIL, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) BOARD_C, (select count(*) from comment WHERE writer = #{userId}) COMMENT_C FROM USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT USER_PWD, USER_NM, SUBSTRING_INDEX(USER_EMAIL, '@', 1) AS USER_EMAIL1, SUBSTRING_INDEX(USER_EMAIL, '@', -1) AS USER_EMAIL2 FROM USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
